sentences.sentence: But not at Pitsea, because the surrounding wetlands are among Britain's few remaining breeding grounds of the black-tailed godwit.
sentences.translation: 但是在Pitsea这个法子却行不通，因为该地附近的湿地是黒尾长嘴涉水鸟在不列颠仅存的几个繁殖地之一。

sentences.sentence: In 2007 scientists recorded a godwit flying more than 7, 000 miles (11, 500 kilometers), from Alaska to New Zealand, in nine days at an average speed of about 35 miles an hour (56 kilometers an hour).
sentences.translation: 2007年，科学家们记录了一只黑尾豫在九天之内以平均每小时35英里(56千米)的速度从阿拉斯加飞到了新西兰，飞行里程超过7000英里(11500千米)。
